net.mmarss.grease.geom2d

Class Ray

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mmarss.grease.geom2d.Ray

  • public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a two-dimensional ray. This class is immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ray(float dx, float dy)
      Constructs a new ray from the point (0, 0) in the given direction.
      Ray(Pointc origin, float dx, float dy)
      Constructs a new ray from the given origin in the given direction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean intersects(Circle other)
      Tests whether this ray intersects the given circle.
      boolean intersects(Rect other)
      Tests whether this ray intersects the given axis-aligned rectangle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ray

        public Ray(float dx,
           float dy)
        Constructs a new ray from the point (0, 0) in the given direction. The given direction will be normalized when it is stored.
        Parameters:
        dx - the x-component of the ray direction.
        dy - the y-component of the ray direction.

      • Ray

        public Ray(Pointc origin,
           float dx,
           float dy)
        Constructs a new ray from the given origin in the given direction. The given direction will be normalized when it is stored.
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin of the ray.
        dx - the x-component of the ray direction.
        dy - the y-component of the ray direction.

    • Method Detail

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Circle other)
        Tests whether this ray intersects the given circle.
        Parameters:
        other - the circle to test intersection with.
        Returns:
        true if this ray intersects the given circle, or false if not.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rect other)
        Tests whether this ray intersects the given axis-aligned rectangle.
        Parameters:
        other - the rectangle to test intersection with.
        Returns:
        true if this ray intersects the given rectangle, or false if not.
